about_the_game:
Discover Prosperity, a huge island of 4*4km with its beautiful cities and countryside full of opportunities!

There is a lot of ways to explore prosperity:

  • Take a walk in our cities to make some shopping, or simply talk with the other players around
  • Go on a road trip with your car or bike and explore the countryside
  • Enjoy the view from our unique aerial subway



Socialize is a non-linear, multiplayer role-playing game, where we give you the tools to find your own ways of making money, you can for example :

  • Gather resources and sell them "as-is"
  • Transform your resources into more valuable products and sell them to shops or other players
  • Sell your services (car driving, protection, anything you can think of) to other players
  • Enroll yourself in the Police forces to fight against criminals
  • Try to become rich doing buisness activities (sell items, become a politican, or heist the bank!)



Socialize is not just another generic MMORPG like we always see. We don't have a mega server, with all the players having the same experience. Instead, we give you the tools to create your own role-playing server and join unique communities with their own vision of what roleplaying should be!

content_descriptors.notes: It's a multiplayer roleplaying game, with gun fights. Players can talk and kill each other.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: If you're a fan of Altis life, DarkRP, GTAV RP and more, Socialize is the multiplayer role-playing game you've been waiting for! Join a unique community that will fit your vision of roleplaying in this endless living world and write your own story with no limits!
